artist: Bill Mercer; Author: Richard Loranger; Printer: The Source, New York; Publisher: Exot Books, Massapequa, N.Y.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
inscription: Title page, blue ink pen: To FLy - / ONE OF Few PEOPS /  THAT I DON'T NEED TO / TELL QUESTION - / Buzz on - / Richard / (smiley face)
medium: Letterpress with offset lithography, bound volume
title: 6 Questions
